summary: Safety policy update: require owner+timestamp on orders/reports, dual-key approvals for protected orders, and grace window before enforcement.

directives.details: Publish policy requiring order/report owner and timestamp fields; define protected order types requiring dual-key approvals.
Until 2025-10-23T00:00:00Z, warn (do not block) when owner/timestamp or approvals are missing; after cutoff, block and set acceptance=blocked.
Provide validator hooks/docs for manufacturing and field workspaces to check required fields and approvals prior to commit/publish.
Monitor exchange for violations; emit a safety_readiness report with observed compliance, warnings, and any enforcement events.
